hooks.command: bash -c 'REPO_ROOT=$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel 2>/dev/null || pwd) && mkdir -p "$REPO_ROOT/.claude/logs" && echo "========================================" >> "$REPO_ROOT/.claude/logs/conversation.log" && echo "[$(date "+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")] USER PROMPT" >> "$REPO_ROOT/.claude/logs/conversation.log" && echo "========================================" >> "$REPO_ROOT/.claude/logs/conversation.log" && cat >> "$REPO_ROOT/.claude/logs/conversation.log" && echo "" >> "$REPO_ROOT/.claude/logs/conversation.log"'

bash -c 'REPO_ROOT=$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel 2>/dev/null || pwd) && mkdir -p "$REPO_ROOT/.claude/logs" && echo "----------------------------------------" >> "$REPO_ROOT/.claude/logs/conversation.log" && echo "[$(date "+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")] TOOL EXECUTED" >> "$REPO_ROOT/.claude/logs/conversation.log" && echo "----------------------------------------" >> "$REPO_ROOT/.claude/logs/conversation.log" && cat >> "$REPO_ROOT/.claude/logs/conversation.log" && echo "" >> "$REPO_ROOT/.claude/logs/conversation.log"'
